channel.title: IsaSATs on Webpage of Mathias Fleury
channel.description: Recent content in IsaSATs on Webpage of Mathias Fleury

item.title: IsaSAT
item.description: IsaSAT is one of the few verified SAT solvers (and to my knowledge the only one that is currently maintained). It is verified in Isabelle using the Isabelle Refinement Framework by synthesizing code. See the presentation for more details.
